import axios from'axios';import{API_URL}from'../constants/constants';// import axiosClient from 'actions/constants/axiosClient';
var token=localStorage.getItem('token');var headers={Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)};export var getAllCity=function getAllCity(){return axios({method:"GET",url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/tinhthanh/city")});};export var getAllDistrictByCityId=function getAllDistrictByCityId(id){return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/tinhthanh/city/").concat(id,"/district"));};export var getAllWardByDistrictId=function getAllWardByDistrictId(id){return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/tinhthanh/district/").concat(id,"/ward"));};export var updateAddressUser=function updateAddressUser(data){return axios({method:"PUT",url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/address/customer?username=").concat(data.username),data:data,headers:headers});};
